answers.answer: Hi.what tests did you have done?HA1C is probably the best for seeing what your sugar levels have been over the past 3 months.Glucose tolerance test can also be used for testing for diabetes.Seeing you have this reaction to sugar, best is that you avoid sugar and refine carbohydrates.  Get plenty of exercise and keep your weight as close to ideal as possible.

question: Can a person develop Type II diabetes but their blood sugar been in normal limits. I have all the symptoms of Type II.  After I eat anything with sugar I feel drunk, lightheaded, EXTREMELY IRRITATED and both hands and feet tingle/sting.  I have been tested for diabetes but the blood work always comes back fine.
title: I have all the symptoms
